text:
Reese Witherspoon isn't afraid to get her hands dirty. The actress and star of Disney's upcoming A Wrinkle in Time did just that on Sunday. "I'm running a little bit late for work today, but I heard my friend is really close by, so I wanna go meet her really quick," Reese said in a series of clips on Instagram. The "friend" in question turned out to be her very own star, to which she gave a motivational speech after giving it a good scrubdown.

"Now you're looking good, girl," the mom of three joked. "That's right. And don't you let people walk all over you. I know you're on the street, but don't you do that. You're a queen. You're a queen!" Don't mind us, we'll just be over here replaying Reese's inspiring message on a loop. See more photos from Reese's hilarious encounter with her star ahead.
title: Reese Witherspoon Gives a Motivational Speech to Her Walk of Fame Star, Wins the Internet
